Makedoc: The MIADOC Manual Generator

The makedoc utility is described in general in doc/admin/makedoc.html.

This document explains how to structure a manual and using the special tags, supplied by makedoc.

These templates can be used as a starting point for a new manual: Simply copy the template.book file, create the src directory, and start creating HTML-alike files in this src directory.

As shown in src/template.html, the HTML files need only contain heading tags, and text for a start.

The remaining pages of these templates, show a few commonly used situations on MIADOC manuals. Use them to copy/paste from, to create your manuals.
